data.text: Egha e, Efesusɨn Kraisɨn adarazir gumazir dapaniba, ataghɨragha bar oseme. Egha e kurim inigha Kosɨn Arighatɨzim baghavɨra zui. Egha amɨmzaraghan, e Rodesɨn Arighatɨzimɨn ghue. Egha Rodes ategha Pataran nguibamɨn ghue.
Egha e Pataran kurir mam bato. A Finisian zuima, e an bɨnigha zui.
Egha e Saiprusɨn Arighatɨzimɨn gara, agharir kɨriamɨn amadaghan a gitagha ghua, Sirian Provinsɨn zui. Egha Tairɨn nguibamɨn aghegha kurimɨn itir biziba kagh dar arighasa.
21:4 Aposel 20:23; 21:12E kagh Kraisɨn adarazir apigha me ko 7plan aruebar ike. Ezɨ Godɨn Duam me mɨkemezɨ me Pol mɨgɨa ghaze, nɨ Jerusalemɨn mangan kogham.
Ezɨ kurim Tair ataghɨraghasava amima, Kraisɨn adarazi uan amuiroghboriba ko, en akua nguibar ekiamɨn azenan zui. Egha ongarir dadarimɨn e teviba pɨrigha God ko mɨgei.
21:6 Aposel 20:36Ezɨ e me ko uan dafaribar suigha, e kurim inigha zuima, me uamategha uan dɨpenibar zui.
Ezɨ e Tair ategha Tolemesɨn nguibamɨn otivigha, dughiar aghuim Kraisɨn adarazigh anigha, me ko aruer vamɨran ike.

21:8 Aposel 6:5; 8:5; 8:26; 8:40; Efesus 4:11; 2 Timoti 4:5Egha amɨmzaraghan e me ategha Sisarian nguibar ekiamɨn otivigha ghua, Filipɨn dɨpenimɨn iti. Filip Ekiamɨn Akar Aghuim akurir gumazir mam. Egha a 7plan gumazir aposelbar akurvazir gumazamizibar mav.
21:9 Joel 2:28; Aposel 2:17A guivir igiar pumuning ko pumuning iti, egha me Godɨn akam inigha izir amizibar mɨn akam akuri.
E mong dughiar maba Sisarian ikezɨ, Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir mam, Agabus, a Judian Distrighɨn ikegha Sisarian izaghirɨ.

21:11 Jon 21:18; Aposel 20:23; 21:33Egha a en bighan izava Polɨn letiam uan dafarimning ko suemning ikegha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Godɨn Duam kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Kamaghɨra Judan Jerusalemɨn itiba, letɨn kamɨn ghuavim ikeghɨva a isɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar anɨngam.’ ”
E kamaghɨn oregha, e ko Sisarian gumazamiziba Jerusalemɨn mangan koghasa Pol gakaghori.
21:13 Aposel 20:24Ezɨ Pol me ikaragha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia tizim bagha aziava nan navim gamima a ikufi? Me na ikɨsɨ, a dera. Kɨ uaghan Ekiam Iesusɨn ziam bagh Jerusalemɨn aven aremegham, a dera.”
Pol bar gavgavizɨma e tagha anetegha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Bizir tizim Ekiam a damusɨ ifongegh, an a damu.”
Egha gɨn e bizibar kɨrigha Jerusalemɨn ghuavanabo.
Ezɨ Sisarian itir Kraisɨn adarasi, men marazi en akua ghua Nasonɨn dɨpenimɨn e ikiamin naghɨn e atɨ. A Saiprusɨn gumazir bar faraghavɨra Iesus gɨfogha an gɨn zuim.
Egha e Jerusalemɨn otozɨma, Kraisɨn adarazi e bagha bar akonge.
21:18 Aposel 15:2; 15:13; Galesia 1:19; 2:9Egha amɨmzaraghan, Pol en marazi ko Jemsɨn ganasa zui. Dughiar kamɨn siosɨn gumazamizir dapaniba bar, uaghan iti.
21:19 Aposel 15:4; 15:12; Rom 15:18-19Pol dughiar aghuim me ganigha, Ekiam Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar tongɨn an dafarimɨn amizir biziba bar dar gun me mɨgei.

Ezɨ Kraisɨn adarazir gumazir dapaniba kamaghɨn oregha Ekiamɨn ziam fe. Egha me Pol mɨgɨa ghaze, “En anav, nɨ fo Judan gumazamizir bar avɨriba nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Ekiamɨn iti. Egha me bar Moses Osirizir Araziba bagha gavgafi.

21:21 Aposel 16:3; Galesia 2:3Ezɨ gumazir maba me mɨgɨa ghaze, Pol Judan gumazir Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar tongɨn itiba Moses Osirizir Arazibar gɨn mangan men anogorosi. Egha ghaze, ia uan boribar mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghoran markɨ, egh Judaba e uan arazibar amuan markɨ.
E fo, nɨ izezɨ, me oregham, eghtɨ e ua manmaghɨn damuam?
21:23-24 Dɨboboniba 6:13-21Nɨ kamaghɨn damu. Kagh e ko itir gumazir pumuning ko pumuning God ko akar dɨkɨrɨzir gavgavir mam gami.

21:24 Aposel 18:18Nɨ me inigh ia Godɨn damazimɨn zueghsɨ, arazir kam damu. Egh me uan dapanir arɨzibagh isamin ofaba, nɨ adagh ivezam. Nɨ kamaghɨn damightɨma, gumazamiziba bar fogh suam, ka ti akar ifavaritam, ezɨ nɨ uaghan Judan Arazibagh ami.21:24 Nɨ Aposelbar Ingangariba 18:18ɨn gan, uaghan Dɨboboniba 6:1-21.

21:25 Aposel 15:29Ezɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizir Iesusɨn gɨn zuiba, e akɨnafarir mamɨn uan nɨghnɨzim osirigha me bagha fomɨra anemada. Egha me mɨgɨa ghaze, ia marvir guabar ofa gamir asɨzibar aman markɨ. Egh ia uaghan asɨzir ghuziba itiba koma asɨzir me fɨragharim dafa mɨsozibar aman markɨ, egh uari isɨ dakuva arazir kurabar amuan markɨ.”

Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Pol tagha ghua gumazir kaba ini. Egha amɨmzaraghan, me ghua arazir Godɨn damazimɨn zueghamim, a me ko a gamigha, Godɨn Dɨpenir mɨriamɨn aven ghua ofa gamir gumazibav gɨa ghaze, dughiar manamɨn e Godɨn damazimɨn zueghamin arazimɨn dughiam gɨvaghtɨ, me e bagh vaghvagh ofa damuam.
Ezɨ dughiar 7pla gɨvasava amima Judan gumazir Esian Provinsɨn itiba Godɨn Dɨpenim avɨnizir dɨvazimɨn aven Polɨn api. Egha gumazamizibar navibagh inivima me Polɨn suiragha kamaghɨn dɨa mɨgei,

21:28 Esekiel 44:7; Aposel 6:13“Israelɨn gumaziba, ia en akuragh! Gumazir kam, en gumazamizibagh asɨghasɨghasa, gumazir igharaziba ko nguibar igharaziba bar men sure gami. Egha Moses Osirizir Araziba ko Godɨn Dɨpenim gasɨghasɨgha mɨgei. A uaghan Grighɨn gumaziba inigha Godɨn Dɨpenim avɨnizir dɨvazimɨn aven ghua, God ua bagha inabazir Dɨpenim gamima a Godɨn damazimɨn mɨze.”

21:29 Aposel 20:4; 24:5-6; 2 Timoti 4:20(Me faragha Efesusɨn gumazim Trofimusɨn garima, a Pol ko nguibar ekiamɨn aven arui. Ezɨ me kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, Pol a inigha Godɨn Dɨpenim avɨnizir dɨvazimɨn aven ghu.)

Ezɨ nguibar ekiamɨn gumazamiziba bar naviba me ginivima, me tintinibar ivemara izi. Egha Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn mɨriamɨn Polɨn suiragha a kurugha zui. Egha me zuamɨra Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn mɨriamɨn tiar akar ekiaba ase.21:30 Dɨvazir avɨriba Godɨn Dɨpenim okari, ezɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba dɨvazir faraghavɨra itimrama aven mangam. Akar kam, “Me Pol kurugha Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn dɨvazir azenan itimɨn ghu,” a dɨvazir namba 2 mɨgei. Tiar akaba me da ase, kar namba 2ɨn dɨvazimɨn tiar akaba. Kamaghɨn gumazamiziba danganir ekiar uari akuvir itimɨn iti, kar Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn dɨvazir namba 1 an okarizim.
Egha Judan gumazamiziba aremeghamin mɨdorozim Pol gamima Romɨn mɨdorozir gumazibar ekiam oraki. Ezɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨam ghua kamaghɨn a bato, Jerusalemɨn gumazamiziba uariv sosi.

Ezɨ a zuamɨra mɨdorozir gumazibar garir gumazir dapanir maba ko, mɨdorozir gumaziba inigha me ivemara danganir gumazamizir avɨrim iti naghɨn zui. Ezɨ Pol mɨsozir gumaziba mɨdorozir gumazir ekiam ko an gumazibar ganigha Pol ataki.

Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumazibar gumazir dapanim iza Polɨn suiragha mɨdorozir gumazibav geima, me senɨn pumuningɨn a ike. Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumazibar gumazir dapanim, Judan gumazibar azara, “Kar tina, egha a tizim gami?”

Ezɨ avɨrir ekiar kamɨn aven me pura tintinimɨn bizibav gei. Me nɨgɨnir dafam gamima, mɨdorozir gumazibar gumazir dapanim deragha bizitam baragha a gɨfozir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a uan mɨdorozir gumazibav kemezɨma, me a inigha uan dɨpenimɨn ghu.
Pol dɨpenir kamɨn adɨrɨziamɨn otivasava amima gumazamiziba a mɨsoghasa bar kaghɨram anerɨsi. Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumaziba a gisaghpu.
21:36 Luk 23:18; Jon 19:15; Aposel 22:22Ezɨ gumazamizir avɨrir men gɨn zuiba dia kamaghɨn mɨgei, “A mɨsueghtɨ, an aremegh!”
Ezɨ me Pol inigha mɨdorozir gumazibar dɨpenimɨn aven mangasava amima, a Grighɨn akamɨn men gumazir dapanimɨn azara, “Kɨ bizitam nɨ mɨkɨmam, o?”
21:38 Aposel 5:36-37Kɨ ghaze, nɨ Isipɨn gumazim, nɨ fomɨra gavman ko mɨsogha, 4,000plan gumazir kuraba inigha ghua gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn ghu. Nɨ gumazir kam?”

Ezɨ Pol kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Puvatɨ. Kɨ Judabar gumazim, kɨ Silisian Distrighɨn aven itir nguibam Tarsusɨn gumazim. Kɨ ziam itir nguibar ekiamɨn gumazim. Kɨ nɨ azai, nɨ nan amamangatɨghtɨ, kɨ akatam gumazamizibav kɨmasa.”
Ezɨ mɨdorozir gumazibar gumazir dapanim a mɨkemezɨ, Pol adɨrɨziamɨn tugha uan dafarimra gumazamiziba aminifa. Ezɨ me bar moghɨra nɨmɨra itima, a Hibrun akamɨn me mɨgei.
